title: Bug 101187: Localization key cannot be blank when adding.
description: When adding a localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When attempting to add a localization key with a blank value, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
EB: The expected behavior is that even when the key is left blank, it should still be possible to externalize the text in the chart title.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the properties file and leave the key blank, but provide a valid value. 2. Verify that the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
